name: Arch Ethereum Web3
description: The Arch Ethereum Web3 Token is comprised of governance tokens from the major decentralized protocols. Its objective is to track the returns of the Ethereum Web3 Index (a broad market index, considered a gauge for the overall web3 ecosystem). This well-diversified asset, provides market-weighted exposure to a wide selection of sectors, and its constituents represent roughly 70% of the market capitalization in the Ethereum Web3 Index.
